text: Brian George (born 1 July 1952) is a Canadian actor. He plays the father of Rajesh Koothrappali on The Big Bang Theory. Recently, he voiced Alfred Pennyworth in Batman: The Killing Joke (2016). George was born in Jerusalem in 1952, moved to London next year and to Canada in 1966. ==Other websites== * Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Toronto Category:Canadian Jews Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Jewish actors Category:Naturalized citizens of Canada Category:Naturalised citizens of the United Kingdom
title: Brian George
